name: Alan (ChrisDeneos)
description:
Alan was created during the RetroJam at Isart Digital Paris in 2015. You play as Alan the Alien, you have to abduct cows, but be careful on the way back to your ship! The goal was to make a tribute the NES/MSX era, the game is inspired by Metal Gear.

Credits:

- Aurore Galati

- Florian Dufour

- Lucas Leplat

- David Guinot

- Christophe Galati
